 1: <?php
 2: 
 3:     namespace UserApp;
 4: 
 5:     use \InvalidArgumentException;
 6:     
 7:     abstract class ClientBase {
 8:         private $_source;
 9: 
10:         protected $_options;
11:         protected $_transport;
12:         protected $_logger;
13: 
14:         public function __construct(Client $source){
15:             $this->_source = $source;
16:         }
17: 
18:         // Options
19: 
20:         public function getOption($name){
21:             return $this->_source->_options->$name;
22:         }
23: 
24:         public function getOptions(){
25:             if($this->_source->_options == null){
26:                 $this->_source->_options = ClientOptions::getGlobal()->createCopy();
27:             }
28:             return $this->_source->_options;
29:         }
30: 
31:         public function setOption($name, $value){
32:             $this->_source->_options->$name = $value;
33:         }
34: 
35:         public function setOptions($options){
36:             $this->_source->_options->set($options);
37:         }
38: 
39:         // Debug
40: 
41:         protected function debugMode(){
42:             return $this->_source->_options->debug;
43:         }
44: 
45:         // Logger
46: 
47:         public function hasLogger(){
48:             return $this->_source->_logger != null;
49:         }
50: 
51:         public function getLogger(){
52:             if($this->debugMode() && $this->_source->_logger === null){
53:                 $this->setLogger(new Logging\MemoryLogger());
54:             }
55:             return $this->_source->_logger;
56:         }
57: 
58:         public function setLogger(Logging\ILogger $logger){
59:             if($logger === null){
60:                 throw new InvalidArgumentException("Logger cannot be null.");
61:             }
62:             $this->_source->_logger = $logger;
63:         }
64: 
65:         // Transport
66: 
67:         public function getTransport(){
68:             // If not set, then set the default transport.
69:             if($this->_source->_transport == null){
70:                 $this->setTransport(new Http\CurlTransport());
71:             }
72:             return $this->_source->_transport;
73:         }
74: 
75:         public function setTransport(Http\ITransport $transport){
76:             if($transport == null){
77:                 throw new InvalidArgumentException("Transport cannot be null.");
78:             }
79:             $this->_source->_transport = $transport;
80:         }
81:     }
82: 
83: ?>
